body: Imma do it. I'm gonna ask for a translation

"selling oil" is an expression in Japanese for slacking/wasting time so the kancole girls are wondering what he's doing 
The story is something like the teitoku's work in kancole is decreasing so he went to azur lane and he gets raped etc.
sry if i sound like a snob

its a story bout kancole's teitoku who selling oil but ended up become azur Lane's shikikan because akagi.
And he doesn't die. Just keep hidden by akagi. 
Poor kancole's fleet though.. they worried and will make delicious treat for him.. but..
I feel like she did something that made him do it, I feel like she also killed him in the process...
